text.section:
The Department may require a person to submit to the Department a report that contains the information listed in subsection (b) of this section, if the person:
moves personal property to any county or municipal corporation from the county or municipal corporation where it was assessed;
moves personal property from outside this State to a county or municipal corporation inside this State; or
possesses, cares for, or manages any personal property that:
is not assessed; or
the Department suspects is not assessed.

The report shall contain:
a list of:
all personal property assessable by the Department; and
all personal property assessable but not previously assessed by the Department that the person possesses, cares for, or manages; and
the name of each person who owns an item of the personal property.
